entry.title: [CA][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API] - Backend maintenance
entry.content:
Jan 18, 10:49 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 17, 05:08 UTC
Verifying - Update : The current maintenance has been completed. Our teams are monitoring the situation.

Jan 16, 22:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 16, 18:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/01/2023 22:30 UTC
End time : 17/01/2023 08:00 UTC
Service Impact : During the related maintenance, some features on the Canada API, as well as on the Canada Control Panel will be unavailable.
API Canada:
- Orders in CA/APAC zone will be unavailable.
- The retrieval of information about European service/IPs will be unavailable for customers.
- The listing of European IPs of customers will be unavailable.
- Customers IP listing will only list Canadian IPs.

Control Panel in Canada :
- The listing of services in the control panel will be unavailable.
- Ordering of new products not available from the CA/APAC website.
Related Maintenance : https://customer-service.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/h1qbgnmh0dr9
Service Improvement : OVHcloud will operate a maintenance on its internal infrastructure to improve its reliability.

entry.title: [EU][API] - New Service IP for OVHcloud API
entry.content:
Jan 3, 09:12 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 3, 08:31 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 2, 12:05 UTC
Update - The current maintenance will be carried out as follows.
Start time : 03/01/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 03/01/2023 09:00 UTC

Dec 2, 09:11 UTC
Scheduled - Following a coordination point with our teams, we will post a next update before each operation (minimum 24h each intervention). Please note that you must have made the connection changes as soon as possible to avoid any disruption in your services

Dec 1, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 27, 16:48 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/01/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During the migration, connection might be reset for one minute.
Service improvement : OVHcloud will change the service IP for its APIs (api.ovh.com, eu.api.ovh.com, eu.api.soyoustart.com, eu.api.kimsufi.com).
Customers using the OVHcloud APIs must verify that their outgoing firewalls is allowing connection to the new service IP: 141.95.186.223, on port 443.

entry.title: [Global][Customer Service] - Support
entry.content:
Dec 6, 16:44 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/12/2022 15:23 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Service impact : Customers may experience 
some issue to reach our short french number 1007
You may call us on 0972101007 or +33374025589
Related Incident : Incident link
Root cause : A network device has been identified to be the cause the incident
Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working to solve the problem

entry.title: [CA/EU][Customer Service] - Renewal services
entry.content:
Dec 6, 14:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/12/2022 15:30 UTC
End Time : 05/12/2022 14:51 UTC
Service impact : Customers who are under manual renewal were not able to renew their expired services.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 5, 11:18 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are still working on a fix.
Workaround : Our teams have set up a temporary fix that allows you to renew your services. Only IPs will not be renewed.

Dec 3, 18:19 UTC
Identified - Start time : 03/12/2022 15:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers who are under manual renewal are not able to renew their expired services.
Ongoing actions : The problem is identified, until the patch is applied the affected services will not be suspended.

Dec 3, 17:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/12/2022 15:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers who are under manual renewal are not able to renew their expired services.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [CA][CustomerService] - Control panel IP addresses

Dec 5, 13:48 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/12/2022 22:30 UTC 
End Time : 03/12/2022 03:00 UTC 
All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 1, 22:30 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/12/2022 22:30 UTC 
Service impact : Some customers with a high number of IP addresses might not see all their IP addresses in the control panel.
Ongoing actions : Our team detected that it impact a few number of customer, and are investigating the root-cause of this issue.
We apologize for the impact.

Scheduled - Start time : 24/11/2022 22:00 UTC 
End time : 24/11/2022 22:30 UTC 
Service impact :  
The New Help Center (Beta) will be temporarily unavailable.
For any request use the address : https://help.ovhcloud.com to find an on-line answer to your question. 
To create a ticket from your customer panel: https://www.ovh.com/manager/#/dedicated/support/tickets. Please note that tickets might take longer time to be processed during the maintenance period.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on our customer service space.

entry.title: [EU][Support] - Anormal process rate
entry.content:
Nov 14, 09:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time :10/11/2022 08:00 UTC
End Time : 10/11/2022 20:00 UTC
Root cause : We had a delay on emails sending requests processing
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 10, 18:18 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented.
We observed less delay then previously reported.
We are putting the issue under monitoring as of precaution.

Nov 10, 13:40 UTC
Identified - Start time : 10/11/2022 08:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experiment delays in products / services related emails reception
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Root cause : We have a delay on emails sending requests processing
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
